item.title: Joy without Guilt
item.description: Publish steps Mark Page as “Make it public for publishing” Hugo page proporties public: true tags: category: date: 2023-02-07 Then select “Export all public pages to hugo” export zip file unzip and copy new files to Git folder Commit changes Github action will build and deploy I am very grateful, and I feel very fortunate. I just came back from a one week trip to Los Cabos Mexico. Feeling Joy Escaping the grey weather.
